mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_no, user_id, total_amount, status, shipping_address, create_time, update_time ) VALUES ( #{orderNo}, #{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{status}, #{shippingAddress}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} )

INSERT INTO order_item ( order_id, sku_id, product_name, sku_type, quantity, price, total_price, create_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{skuId}, #{productName}, #{skuType}, #{quantity}, #{price}, #{totalPrice}, #{createTime} )
mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_no, user_id, total_amount, status, shipping_address, payment_time, create_time, update_time FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
SELECT item_id, order_id, sku_id, product_name, sku_type, price, quantity, total_price, create_time FROM order_item WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, update_time = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'pending' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as pending, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'paid' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as paid, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'shipped' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as shipped, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'completed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as completed, SUM(CASE WHEN status = 'cancelled' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as cancelled FROM orders WHERE user_id = #{userId}
